name: Classic Beef Tacos
instructions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add ground beef and diced onion, cook until beef is browned (about 5-7 minutes)
Drain excess fat from the pan
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute
Stir in taco seasoning and water
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens
Warm taco shells according to package directions
Fill each shell with seasoned beef
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream
Serve with salsa on the side
notes: For a healthier option, use ground turkey or lean ground beef. Add jalape√±os for extra heat, or guacamole for creaminess. Soft tortillas can be substituted for hard shells.
